thread.section_title: Paypal Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Paypal | www.paypal.com
thread.title: Bee Bee

author: Bee Bee
title: Bee Bee
text: Iv been using PayPal for many years now and iv seen many cases where the PayPal accounts are limited etc and people are not happy, to be honest PayPal is right to do what it is doing to avoid any fraud, technically when a payment is sent to a PayPal user PayPal do not get the money straight they have to wait. But trust the buyer n credit there account accordingly if you have not much history on PayPal but should build that up, as you use PayPal the system will see you are a genuine person and offer instant bank transfer
